Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions

Class Action

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddBalanceAction, AttackAction, ChangeAttributeAction, ChangeMaxAttributeAction, DeathAction, DoNothingAction, DrinkPuddleAction, DropAction, GreatSlamAction, HealAction, KickAction, MonologueAction, MoveActorAction, PickUpAction, RefreshAction, SellAction, SpitBehaviour, StabStepAction, TickableAction, TravelAction, UnlockAction, UpgradeAction, WindowSmashAction
public abstract class Action
extends java.lang.Object
Base class for Actions. These represent things that the actor can do.

  • Constructor Details

    • Action

      public Action()

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public abstract java.lang.String execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Perform the Action.
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor performing the action.
      map - The map the actor is on.
      Returns:
      a description of what happened (the result of the action being performed) that can be displayed to the user.

    • menuDescription

      public abstract java.lang.String menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      Describe what action will be performed if this Action is chosen in the menu.
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor performing the action.
      Returns:
      the action description to be displayed on the menu

    • hotkey

      public java.lang.String hotkey()
      Returns the key used in the menu to trigger this Action. There's no central management system for this, so you need to be careful not to use the same one twice.
      Returns:
      The key we use for this Action in the menu, or null to have it assigned for you.
      See Also:
      Connascence

    • getNextAction

      public Action getNextAction()
      This provides a mechanism for Actions to take more than one turn. For example, an action can change its state and return itself, or return the next Action in a series. By default, this returns null, indicating that the Action will complete in one turn.
      Returns:
      null
